short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be able to copy URLs from highlighted selection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension allows users to copy URLs from highlighted selection.

To use it, select a region on any webpage, right click, and click "Copy URLs from Highlighted Selection". Then you can paste the urls where ever you want.

If you want to open the urls you have copied, you can use another Chrome extension such as "Open Multiple URLs".
